original_title: Penis Dementia: The Search for the Perfect Penis
overview: Why is this wiggly appendage such a source of tension, confusion and anxiety? Can a search for penis perfection provide the answer? Penis Dementia is an amusing, irreverent and insightful hunt for seminal answers to penetrating questions with help from doctors, sex experts, and actual penis users (male and female).
title: Penis Dementia: The Search for the Perfect Penis
